ad_block_detected.title: Adblock Enabled
ad_block_detected.text: Adblock(or anything that prevents loading the resources) is working. Misskey doesn't show ads, but you may not use some of the functions(following users, etc.) if you use Adblock. To use Misskey pleasantly, disable Adblock.

confirmation_dialog.title: Are you sure?
confirmation_dialog.text: Do you really want to delete all nofications?

re_confirmation_dialog.title: Really?
re_confirmation_dialog.text: There are some unread nofications. Are you sure you want to delete all notifications?

post.repost_form_title: Do you want to repost this status?

donate_widget.name: 寄付のお願い
donate_widget.title: 寄付のお願い
donate_widget.text: Misskeyの運営にはドメイン、サーバー等のコストが掛かります。 Misskeyは広告を掲載したりしないため、 収入を皆様からの寄付に頼っています。 もしご興味があれば、@syuiloまでご連絡ください。ご協力ありがとうございます。

settings.display_user_name_in_post: Show the user's name in the posts
settings.display_user_screen_name_in_post: Show the user's ID in the posts
settings.display_created_at_in_post: Show the created time in the posts
settings.display_actions_in_post: Show the actions in the posts
settings.confirmation_when_repost: Show a confirm dialog when I repost
settings.enable_url_preview_in_post: Enable URL preview in a post
settings.thumbnailyze_attached_image_of_post: Show the thumbnail image instead of the raw image
settings.enable_notification_sound_when_receiving: Enable the notification sound when receive a new post
